web_snippets: Daniel Kurgan was appointed as the CEO of Arelion in October 2023. Prior to this, he served as Board Executive of Arelion.
Daniel Kurgan, Board Executive of Arelion since January 2022, has more than 25 years of experience from the industry and several leading positions.
With us today to talk about the company's plans and industry outlook is the company's new CEO, Daniel Kurgan. Prior to Arelion, Daniel was CEO ...
